thread.title: UPDATE: 'She's charming': Renée Zellweger films Bridget Jones 3 in Woolwich
thread.title_full: UPDATE: 'She's charming': Renée Zellweger films Bridget Jones 3 in Woolwich

title: UPDATE: 'She's charming': Renée Zellweger films Bridget Jones 3 in Woolwich
text:
0 comments 
Hollywood star Renée Zellweger is filming scenes for Bridget Jones three in Woolwich. 
Ms Zellweger, widely known for portraying the hapless character, was in Sainsbury’s, along Calderwood Road, shooting for the upcoming film yesterday (October 7). 
Shopper Sian Donaldson was out shopping with her daughters, aged six and eight, when they bumped into the star. 
Ms Donaldson, from near Well Hall Road, told News Shopper: "She's a really lovely women who spoke to my daughter about filming and how they pretend to be people. 
"She also told my youngest who was eating a fruit tart how lovely it looked. 
"Renée was charming to talk to and have a giggle with she was walking in and out the shop from 4pm till 5pm quite happily talking to people who were asked to wait to leave the shop until the filming finished in door way, then Renee stood next to us and chatted away." 
MORE TOP STORIES The 46-year-old, who first played the unlucky in love character 14 years ago, is returning to our screens in Bridget Jones' Baby. 
The third instalment in the franchise also stars Sally Philips and Patrick Dempsey, and tells the story of a now loved-up Bridget, who is pregnant. Promoted stories 
Someone from the Sainsbury’s store confirmed the actress was in the supermarket yesterday. 
They said: “She’s downstairs filming. 
“We’re still open, still trading as normal. 
“They’ve got the end of the tills, quite a bit of the shop.” 
A spokesman added they would only be filming scenes in the store for one day. 
Ms Zellweger and the film crew were spotted filming in Greenwich Park on Tuesday (October 6), where Ms Zellweger’s character was sporting a baby on board badge. 
@amberlittlex filming in #woolwich today...I managed to catch a glimpse of her too #bridgetjones pic.twitter.com/AB3Zn0Y6hm — Monica Kabasomi (@MISSKABASOMI) October 7, 2015 
Only renee zellweger filming in sainsburys in Woolwich right now! 🙊😍 — Harriet Eeles (@Harriet_Eeles) October 7, 2015 
As if I've just been watching the new bridge Jones being filmed in woolwich sainsburys 😁💁🏼💗 Share article
